message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. This is a great price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $13,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000 again? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on this price.
